bike.description: Double-butted 6061 aluminum, compact sloping top tube frame design, SST tubing diameters, 1 1/8-1.5" tapered head tube, 34.9 seat tube, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Jamis Road carbon composite straight blade road fork, tapered steerer with 1.5 crown, forged alloy dropouts.
Mavic CXP-22 rims with CNC sidewalls, 28/32H, Formula alloy hubs with QR and 14g black stainless steel spokes
Shimano Tiagra RD-4601 rear and Tiagra FD-4600 front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Tiagra RD-4600 Dual Control STI, 20-Speed
Tektro R312 alloy dual pivot calipers with cartridge pads and Tiagra RD-4600 STI brake levers
Ritchey Comp Logic Curve, 6061 double-butted aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56) 440mm (58/61)
Jamis suede tape with Jamis logo and "J" end plug
Jamis carbon fiber micro-adjust, 31.6 x 350mm with alloy clamp
Selle San Marco SPID Open with Syntex cover and carbon steel rails
